acquisition.translation[0].definitions[0: the process by which you gain knowledge or learn a skill
acquisition.translation[0].definitions[1: the act of getting land, power, money etc
the acquisition of new sites for development
acquisition.translation[0].definitions[2: something that you have obtained by buying it or being given it
The Art Society is holding an exhibition of recent acquisitions.
acquisition.translation[1].definitions[0: when one company buys another one, or part of another one
the group’s acquisition of 85 stores in California
acquisition.translation[1].definitions[1: a company or part of a company that is bought by another company
The group’s latest acquisition is a sportswear firm.
